title: Skirt Steak with Cilantro Garlic Sauce

instructions.1: Make sauce: Mince garlic and mash to a paste with salt. Transfer to a blender and add remaining sauce ingredients, then blend until smooth.
instructions.2: Grill steak: Stir together cumin, salt, and pepper in a small bowl. Pat steak dry, then rub both sides of pieces with cumin mixture.
instructions.3: Heat an oiled well-seasoned ridged grill pan over high heat until hot but not smoking, then grill steak in 2 batches, turning over occasionally, about 2 minutes per batch for thin pieces or 6 to 8 minutes per batch for thicker pieces (medium-rare). Serve steak drizzled with sauce.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the steak from Step 2 being used?
Is sauce from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is steak from Step 2 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is blender from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 3?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the sauce in Step 3?
Can we make (Step 1) and grill (Step 2) at the same time?
